Method.name: Insert
Method.Implementation:
set num = 1 while $data(data(num,"Message")){
set updated = $piece( data(num,"Date"), "Z") ;2015-12-19T21:59:35
set date = $piece( updated,"T"), date = $zstrip(date, "<>WC" ) ;2015-12-19 set time = $piece( updated,"T",2), time = $zstrip(time, "<>WC" ) ;21:59:35
set dateh = $zdh( date, 3) set timeh = $zth( time )
#; Making Moscow timezone, eg adding 3 hours if timeh >= 75600{ ;if time more than 21:00:00 set timeh = timeh - 75600 ;minus 21 hours set dateh = dateh + 1} else{ ;if time fewer than 21:00:00 set timeh = timeh + 10800 ;plus 3 hours }
set tmpDate = $zdt( dateh_","_timeh, 3 ) ;odbc timestamp set tmpAuthor = data(num,"Author"), tmpMessage = data(num,"Message"), tmpUrl = data(num,"Url")
&sql( Insert Into GitHub.CommitTable (Repository, Author, Message, Created, Url) Values (:repositoryId, :tmpAuthor, :tmpMessage, :tmpDate, :tmpUrl) ) if SQLCODE'=0 { Quit } set num = num + 1 } Quit:'$data(SQLCODE) 1 Quit:SQLCODE $$$ERROR(,$system.SQL.SQLCODE(SQLCODE)) Quit 1
